title: Dot Hack G.U. Trilogy [1080p x265][F-R]
description:
This is .hack//G.U. Trilogy. The video comes from the Japanese Blu-Ray and the subs come from the US Region 1 DVD.
So this is not a fansub.

Audio: Japanese
Subtitles: English, Japanese

This is the x265 version. I know last time people wanted to know how long it takes to encode one of these, so I logged the times.
Started at Sun 08/03/2014 12:14:34.94, finished at Wed 08/06/2014 23:04:02.46

Playback help:
For Windows, latest versions of MPC-HC and VLC work.
For MAC/Linux, latest versions of VLC or MPV should work.

Technical Stuff:
Source: Blu-Ray and DVD
Video: x265 crf16
Resolution: 1920x1080
Audio: Japanese 6ch AAC
Subtitles: .ASS English, VobSub English, BDSUP Japanese
